LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorReconPrestige.label: prestige outrider armor
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorReconPrestige.description: A suit of light magically enhanced armor, designed to permit quick movement. mithril plates block attacks without compromising mobility. An anti-gravity enchantment allows a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetReconPrestige.label: prestige outrider helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetReconPrestige.descrip: An armored helmet enchanted to provide combat assistance with a built-in protective mithril plate.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorMarinePrestige.label: prestige crusader armor
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorMarinePrestige.description: A suit of enchanted armor. Layered mithril plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. An anti-gravity enchantment allows a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorMarineHelmetPrestige.label: prestige crusader helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorMarineHelmetPrestige.descri: A crusader armor helmet, enchanted to provide combat assistance and layered mithril plates.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorCataphractPrestige.label: prestige royal guard armor
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorCataphractPrestige.descript: A suit of heavy enchanted armor, built for maximum protection at the cost of mobility. Heavy layered mithril plates with solid ablative coatings stop all but the most well-aimed or powerful attacks. An anti-gravity enchantment prevents the suit's massive weight from immobilizing the wearer entirely, but the suit is still quite cumbersome.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetCataphractPrestige.de: A heavily-armored enchanted helmet, with a solid mithril shell and magical visual system for non-frontal view angles. It protects against all but the most powerful or luckily-aimed shots.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige armor like this is usually made for those of high status. Embedded arcanium threads also enhance the wearer's magical aptitude.
